title: Suppon Monogatari
sinopse:
One of the original gag manga, this collection of shorts features talking crotches, a comedian’s audience made of robots, a man with a turtle attached to his nose, the Goddess of Defeat, and a religious order that wants to ban clothing…

(Source: Baka-Updates)

1. Time Machine no Mikoto (タイムマシンのみこと)
2. Shinagawa Chuushin (品川中心)
3. Suppon Monogatari
4. Sexodus (セクソダス)
5. Make Jorou (負け女郎)
6. Nudian Archipelago (ヌーディアン列島, Nudian Rettou)
